Package galamsey

Class Monitoring

  • java.lang.Object
    • galamsey.Monitoring
  • public class Monitoring
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds information about all observatories. Has methods that return the observatory with the largest average galamsey colour value, Largest galamsey colour value ever recorded and List of all galamsey recorded at a colour value greater than a given number.
    Author:
    Hephzibah Emereole
